text: Don Snow (born 12 February 1956 in London, England) is a British vocalist and multi-instrumentalist, who plays the keyboards, synthesizer, piano, guitar, bass guitar, drums and saxophone. He is primarily known for his work with the new wave bands The Sinceros, Squeeze, and the Catch, as well as Siouxsie and the Banshees. He has also frequently toured with Paul Weller and has played the keyboards, synthesizer and piano on three of his albums. title: Don Snow (keyboardist)
